trans-unit.source: A ModelProperty represents a property on a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um ModelProperty representa uma propriedade num <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Model properties are associated with an instance of an item, which allows them to have simple Value get/set properties instead of using the more cumbersome GetValue/SetValue mechanism of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades do modelo estão associadas uma instância de um item, o que permite que tenham simple valor get/conjunto de propriedades em vez de utilizar o mecanismo de GetValue/SetValue mais complexo de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of a ModelProperty may come from a locally set value, or it may be inherited from somewhere higher up in the element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O valor de um ModelProperty pode ter um localmente definir valor, ou podem ser herdadas algures superior a cópia de segurança na hierarquia de elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A> property of the value returned by <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A> to determine the source of the property value.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A>propriedade do valor devolvido pelo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A>para determinar a origem do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the type that defines this property if <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached*> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o tipo que define esta propriedade se <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached*>devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.IsAttached*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Type> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <xref:System.Type> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the attributes declared on this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os atributos declarados nesta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the attributes as an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os atributos como um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the local value for the property.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o valor local para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When there is no local value set for the property, a value may be inherited from higher in the property hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Quando não existe nenhum local valor definido para a propriedade, um valor pode ser herdado superior na hierarquia de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to set the value to `null`, call <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender definir o valor como `null`, chamar <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A>em vez disso.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*> cast as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*>Converter como um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: If the property value is not a collection, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade não é uma coleção, esta propriedade devolverá `null`.

trans-unit.source: Returns the property value as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor da propriedade como um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently computed value for this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor calculado atualmente para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting a value on this property is the same as calling <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*>, but can be used in data binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: Definir um valor desta propriedade é o mesmo como chamar <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*>, mas podem ser utilizados em expressões de enlace de dados.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.SetValue*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the computed value as an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor calculado como <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns the type converter to use with this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o conversor de tipos para utilizar com esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Underlying type converters are all wrapped so they accept <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Subjacente conversores de tipo são todos encapsuladas para aceitem <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>objetos.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>

trans-unit.source: When performing a conversion to a particular value, the type converter’s return type is not wrapped.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar uma conversão para um determinado valor, tipo de conversor de tipos de retorno não é moldado.

trans-unit.source: Type converters that return standard values also return values as <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Conversores de tipo que devolvem valores padrão também devolvem valores como <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>objetos.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for use with this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> para utilização com esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the default value for this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor predefinido para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the property does not define a default value, this will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade não define um valor predefinido, esta ação irá devolver <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Object> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Object>ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*> cast as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*>Converter como um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: If the property value is not a dictionary, this property will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade não é um dicionário, esta propriedade devolverá <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the equality for properties.
trans-unit.target: Determina a igualdade para propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades são iguais, se tiverem o mesmo nome e o mesmo principal.

trans-unit.source: The property to compare with this property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade para a comparação com esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: if obj is a that equals this property; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é um que é igual a esta propriedade; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para uma <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hashcode as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um código hash como <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the property represents an attached property from a different type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a propriedade representa uma propriedade anexada a partir de um tipo diferente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property represents an attached property from a different type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade representa uma propriedade anexada a partir de um tipo diferente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the property can be shown in a property window.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a propriedade pode ser apresentada numa janela de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property can be shown in a property window; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade pode ser apresentada numa janela de propriedade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor contido na propriedade um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor contido na propriedade for uma <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemCollection"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value contained in the property is a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor contido na propriedade um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItemDictionary"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value contained in the property is a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItemDictionary>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor contido na propriedade for uma <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItemDictionary>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItemDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the property is read only.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a propriedade é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a propriedade é lido apenas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the property is set locally.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor da propriedade está definido localmente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the property is set locally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da propriedade for definido localmente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The name of this property.
trans-unit.target: O nome desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as propriedades são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades são iguais, se tiverem o mesmo nome e o mesmo principal.

trans-unit.source: The first property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade primeiro.

trans-unit.source: The second property.
trans-unit.target: A segunda propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a primeira propriedade for igual a segunda propriedade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the properties are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as propriedades são unequal.

trans-unit.source: Properties are equal if they have the same name and parent.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades são iguais, se tiverem o mesmo nome e o mesmo principal.

trans-unit.source: The first property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade primeiro.

trans-unit.source: The second property.
trans-unit.target: A segunda propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the first property equals the second property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Se a primeira propriedade for igual a segunda propriedade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent of this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o principal desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent of this property as a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o principal desta propriedade como <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>.</xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o tipo de dados da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref:System.Type>da propriedade.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Sets a local value on a property.
trans-unit.target: Define um valor local numa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is not a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>, it is wrapped in a <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>, which is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` não é um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>, mesmo é moldado num <xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem>, que é devolvida ao autor da chamada.</xref:System.Activities.Design.Model.ModelItem> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem>

trans-unit.source: It is valid to set `value` to `null`, in which case <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: É válido para definir `value` para `null`, caso em que <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A>será `null`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is different from calling <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.ClearValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isto é diferente do chamar <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.ClearValue%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelProperty.ClearValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using this method, the value will not be set on the underlying property until the editing context completes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Através deste método, o valor não será definido na propriedade subjacente até concluir o contexto de edição.

trans-unit.source: To update the underlying property immediately, use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ArgumentAccessor.Setter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar a propriedade subjacente imediatamente, utilize <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ArgumentAccessor.Setter%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ArgumentAccessor.Setter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new value to set.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para definir.

trans-unit.source: Returns value as a .
trans-unit.target: Returns value as a .

trans-unit.source: Returns the value set into this property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor definido para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A property may return a value that is inherited further up the element hierarchy, in which case this property will return a value whose <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A> is not `this`.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade pode devolver um valor que é herdado ainda mais a hierarquia de elemento, na qual caso esta propriedade de cópia de segurança irá devolver um valor cujo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A>não é `this`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no value has ever been set for the property Value will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se alguma vez não foi definido nenhum valor para a propriedade valor irá devolver `null`.

trans-unit.source: Returns the property value as a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor da propriedade como um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
